Fun Facts
I am an avid partner-acrobatics certified educator, I have played drums for over 24 years and guitar for 11, ran the 2009 Los Angeles Marathon and a number of half-marathons, learned development with HackReactor, became a digital nomad in 2017 with Remote Year and have continued to travel the world for the last 6 years visiting over 35 countries carrying a ukulele.
